description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.com

Tony Grout - Head of Agile Transformation at Lloyds Banking Group

ABSTRACT
So you’re an engineer in an organisation with at least one smart manager — they sent you here right! But your organisation isn’t smart enough to work out how to scale your agility. You know how they could if only they’d listen. So what can you do? [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/cph-2016/presentations/show_talk.jsp?oid=7753

https://twitter.com/gotocph
https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference
